a.n: Robin Des Bois, Malice A Sherwood

p.d: At just ten years of age, Robin Hood is a hero, though he still lacks the maturity to rein in his recklessness. With a lot of perseverance and humour, the young righter of wrongs and his loyal group of friends protest against all of young Prince John's new schemes. Directed by: St√©phane Mit (season 2, France, 2018)
